name: AutoGPT Agent Alignment
description: Analyzes and aligns generated AutoGPT agent and block code with project requirements, agentic mapping, and FORCE schemas.

required.name: agent_file_path
required.description: Path to the generated agent code file.

required.name: block_file_paths
required.description: Paths to the generated block code files.

optional.name: schema_version
optional.description: FORCE schema version to validate against.

commands.description: Analyze agent and block code for alignment with project and mapping.
Validate code files against FORCE schemas.
